name: Profundis
description:
A short exploration game in a series of dark caves, where you must explore your sorroundings to discover the way forward.

After waking up in a dark jail cell in a cave with no knowledge of who you are, where you are or if anyone is there, you must venture into the unknown with the help of a spirit.

This is an university project and is considered finished. It will not be updated unless we state otherwise.
